body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jack Richardson and the customer's name is Angela Carter.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Jack Richardson. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jack, this is Angela Carter. I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Angela. It's a big decision. Can I start by asking what kind of motorcycle you’re interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not quite sure yet, maybe something for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sounds like you're looking for a touring bike. That’s a great option! May I also have your email address to send you some options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's angela.carter at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Angela! And could I also get your phone number for any follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's two zero three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you for that information. I will compile some motorcycle options for you and send them to your email.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I really appreciate your help, Jack.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Angela! Thank you for your time today, and I look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle. Have a great day!
